snippet: The city Administration for Children’s Services responded to a July 7 article in which N. R. Kleinfield chronicled a woman’s attempts to regain custody of two of her daughters.
lead_paragraph: The city Administration for Children’s Services responded to a July 7 article in which N. R. Kleinfield chronicled a woman’s attempts to regain custody of two of her daughters.

headline.main: The Girls Who Haven’t Come Home
headline.print_headline: The Girls Who Haven’t Come Home
